title: banning system improvements?
body: ive seen people get banned before because they used profanity or bad language now what happened to me not so long ago is i got into a game where i called jg and some dude just locks in without calling so i get in and then i start doing the enemy's jg to avoid any hassles with this man, as i start to do my first camp he start telling the enemy team where i am and follows me around and continues to troll me so i get mad and tell him to F*** off and may have said other things after this game my account got suspended for 14 days now...... why would he not get banned when he is doing soothing out of my control he can stop reasing what i type to me by clicking mute button but i cant stop him from trolling me. Why is chat so punishable yet trolling isn't? :(

replies.body:
Chat logs are easy to review and implement punishments on.
In game behaviour is a lot harder to moderate, do you think Riot have enough staff to watch full replays of every game that gets a report?

Bottom line is, don't stoop to their level. You're only shooting yourself in the foot by bitching at them in chat.
